item.title: Markdown Syntax Quick Guide
item.description: These are the Markdown elements that I often used in Hugo content files, R markdown files, and Jupyter markdown cells.

item.title: Rich Content Quick Guide
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Marina Cria
item.description: I created a website for my sister, Marina. She has a small business making handmade and personalized art pieces.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Nathalia. I am a research scientist with wide range of skills in field, laboratory, and computational biology.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Professional Experience Postdoctoral Research Associate I, University of Arizona, Tucson, AZ October 2019 - present Graduate Research Assistant, Oklahoma State University, Stillwater, OK January 2013 - August 2019 Leadership XSEDE (The Extreme Science and Engineering Discovery Environment) Student Campus Champion, August 2018 - August 2019 Board Member, Mobile Meals, non-profit org.

item.title: Skills
item.description: Check out my projects and recent posts pages for programming and computational biology content.
